Location:
- Living room area, open to an adjacent room, with window on far wall.

Observations:
- Dark laminate wood-look flooring; light gray walls; white baseboards.
- Ceiling fan present; wall return/vent near ceiling.
- Wall quilt/decor, small dining nook with wooden table and two chairs.
- Window with light curtains; plant in seating area.
- Opening to another room (bed visible through doorway).

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- No immediate repairs required.
- Routine maintenance: keep vent clear of dust, inspect window caulk if moisture noticed, ensure furniture does not block vents or exit paths.
